meanings.definition: Having a golden color or quality.
meanings.sent1: The goldenly painted walls brightened up the room.
meanings.sent2: She wore a goldenly dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The goldenly leaves rustled in the autumn breeze.
meanings.sent4: His goldenly voice captivated the audience.
meanings.sent5: The goldenly sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and yellow.
